short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks your carbon footprint as you browse the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online carbon footprint with Chrome Carbon Tracker, the browser extension that monitors and visualizes the environmental impact of your browsing.

Features:

- 24-Hour Carbon Overview: Get a rolling 24-hour snapshot of your carbon usage compared to the average user.

- 7-Day Usage Insight: See how your browsing habits stack up over a week, with detailed stats comparing your carbon usage to typical users.

- Top 5 Carbon-Intensive Domains: Discover which websites consume the most energy while you're browsing. Find out if your top sites are contributing heavily to your online carbon footprint.

Stay informed, reduce your impact, and make eco-conscious decisions with Chrome Carbon Tracker. Download now and start tracking your web-based carbon emissions today!
